hero.headline: Amazon Mentorship Program
hero.shortNarrative: Connect with experienced Amazon leaders for career guidance, leadership development, and industry insights.
hero.narrative: Our mentorship program brings together experienced Amazon leaders and aspiring professionals. Whether you're seeking career guidance, leadership development, or industry insights, our mentors are here to help you reach your full potential.
hero.impactQuote: A single conversation with the right mentor can change the trajectory of your entire career. That's the power of mentorship.

mentorOnboarding.title: Become a Mentor
mentorOnboarding.description: Join MentorConnect and share your expertise with Amazon employees and the wider community
mentorOnboarding.subtitle: Share your expertise and help others grow in their careers
mentorOnboarding.contextDescription: Join our community of expert mentors and make a meaningful impact on professionals seeking guidance. Your experience and insights can help shape the next generation of leaders.
mentorOnboarding.benefit1Desc: Guide mentees through career challenges and celebrate their growth
mentorOnboarding.benefit2Desc: Choose your availability and session durations that work for you
mentorOnboarding.benefit3Desc: Connect with mentees from across the MENA region and beyond

menteeRegistration.title: Join as a Mentee
menteeRegistration.description: Connect with expert mentors from Amazon and beyond
menteeRegistration.subtitle: Connect with experienced mentors and accelerate your growth
menteeRegistration.contextDescription: Join MentorConnect to access personalized guidance from industry experts. Whether you're an individual seeking career growth or an organization looking to develop your team, we're here to help.
menteeRegistration.benefit1Desc: Connect with professionals from Amazon and leading companies
menteeRegistration.benefit2Desc: Get guidance tailored to your specific career objectives
menteeRegistration.benefit3Desc: Access resources and sessions to accelerate your development
menteeRegistration.bioPlaceholder: Tell mentors about yourself and your goals...
menteeRegistration.areasExploringHelp: Select the skills and areas you want to learn more about

menteeRegistration.goalsHelp: Be specific about your goals so mentors can better support you

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our mentorship program
faq.spamQuestion: If I participate, will I be spammed with emails?
faq.spamAnswer: Absolutely not. We respect your inbox and privacy. You'll only receive essential communications: session confirmations, reminders 24 hours before your meetings, and occasional program updates you can opt out of anytime. We never share your email with third parties, and you have full control over your notification preferences in your profile settings.
faq.commitmentQuestion: What is the time commitment for mentors?
faq.commitmentAnswer: You're in control of your availability. Whether you can offer one session per month or several per week, our flexible scheduling adapts to your calendar. Most mentors dedicate 1-2 hours monthly, but there's no minimum requirement. You set your own pace.
faq.matchingQuestion: How are mentors and mentees matched?
faq.matchingAnswer: Mentees browse our mentor directory and choose mentors based on expertise, industry experience, and availability. This self-selection approach ensures both parties are aligned on goals and expectations from the start.
faq.cancelQuestion: What if I need to cancel or reschedule?
faq.cancelAnswer: Life happens! You can cancel or reschedule any session through your calendar link. We just ask for 24 hours notice when possible so the other party can adjust their schedule accordingly.

legal.disclaimer: By participating in the Amazon Mentorship Program, you acknowledge that mentorship sessions are voluntary and for professional development purposes only. Amazon and its affiliates are not responsible for advice given during sessions. All interactions should maintain professional standards and confidentiality.
legal.privacyNotice: Your personal information will be used solely for program administration and matching purposes in accordance with our privacy policy.
legal.termsAgreement: By registering, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
